extendedInfo.description: Stay up to date with cutting edge computer hardware, modding and games coverage from bit-tech. Bit-tech is committed to bringing its readers accurate hardware testing and insightful analysis as well as covering custom PC modification, the best in gaming and daily IT industry news.Now you can access all this great content and more in a great new format optimised especially for Android phones. Even better, the app includes fully optimised mobile access to the renowned bit-tech forums and the bit-tech podcast.

reviews.title: Its nice to have palm bit tech on the go
reviews.comment: However it seems very poorly optimised and poorly executed. Especially considering this is from everything technical ladies over at Bit Tech. Graphs, benchmarks and other pictures in Jpeg format in the stories would be helpful at a glance whats actually happening in each feed? ..and when returning from a story it takes you to the very first page. Scrolling through feeds in a page might also aid flexability. 3/5 Lightningpete
reviews.author: Peter Weatherstone

reviews.title: Great, but currently broken.
reviews.comment: A great app for reading bit-tech articles on the go and for forum use. However, for over a week you cannot load headlines or reviews, but you can use the forums from the app. Feedback sent via the app, but nothing heard or resolved yet. Would be a 5* rating in it\'s fully working state.
reviews.author: Andy Elliott

reviews.title: Broken
reviews.comment: App will not fetch data. Just get an error saying \"could not load latest headlines. Please check your Internet connection\"
reviews.author: Ross Hirons

reviews.title: Can\'t change page
reviews.comment: Good app, although I can\'t view anything other than page one for reviews and that
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good Start
reviews.comment: It works fine, although the UI doesn\'t blend nicely with the rest of the OS (ICS 4.0.3). Also missing the ability to swipe left or right to change between tabs such as \"All\" and \"Hardware\". Other than that very convenient.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Broken
reviews.comment: Has stopped loading headlines and news which were the main reasons I used the app. It was very handy when it worked. Shame :-(
reviews.author: David Starr

reviews.comment: Very good app. The new podcast download button is a much welcome improvement in the latest update.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Did work but stopped
reviews.comment: Does not recognise 3 different wifi signals or data connection... So no news
reviews.author: Tom Baker

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: No longer fetches news, and has not worked for a long time now.
reviews.author: Michael Scott

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Cannot get enough of this app. Keeps me up to date and happy while bored at work.
reviews.author: Nicki Urwin

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: Could be a great app, but lack of a search facility severely impacts its usability.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: \'could not load - check Internet connection\'
reviews.comment: My Internet connection works just fine on every other app.
reviews.author: illy ilija Jovanovic

reviews.title: Fantastic App
reviews.comment: Great little app...love it thanks :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: News stopped working
reviews.comment: Only used it for the news, now doesn\'t update headlines..... Useless now. Tried reinstalling still doesn\'t get headlines. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Colin Miller

reviews.title: Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Lists the headline stories. Lacks a search
reviews.author: James Bird

reviews.title: Not worked for months
reviews.comment: Keeps failing to load new headlines stating that I am not connected to the internet when I am.
reviews.author: Paul Guy

reviews.comment: Not so good UI
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Every
reviews.comment: On
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: That be your mobile provider compressing the pictures (try it in WiFi it be good pictures).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good job adding sideways typing guys, thanks. Has the ability to edit your posts been added?
reviews.author: A Google User
